description:
Tomozaki and Mizusawa scope out a girls` school festival (and its girls). Tomozaki has a deep discussion with Fuka the author. Mimimi drops a bomb.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sometimes the Main Character Can`t Enter the Village of Another Species on His Own
Tashuzoku no Sumu Mura wa Shujinkou dake ja Irenakattari Suru
他種族の住む村は主人公だけじゃ入れなかったりする
